title: [Health] Air pollution was significantly associated with an increased risk of hospital admissions for several neurological disorders, including Parkinson’s disease, Alzheimer’s disease, and other dementias, in a long-term study of more than 63 million older U.S. adults, led by researchers at Harvard.
[Epidemiology] Your "cough cloud" is 7 to 23 times larger when you're not wearing a mask
